displayProperties.description:
Includes the Shadowkeep story campaign, Exotic quests, and raid and dungeon content.

As the heroes of the Last Safe City turn their attention to frontiers beyond the protection of the Vanguard, new Nightmares have emerged on our forgotten Moon. Eris Morn has returned and awoken something that once slumbered beneath the Moon's surfaceâ€”a long-dormant power that even she cannot control.

After purchase, please return to orbit, and this milestone will be added to your inventory if you do not already have it.
displayProperties.name: Shadowkeep
